remoteStorage.js¶

Welcome to the remoteStorage.js documentation!

remoteStorage.js is a JavaScript library for storing user data locally in the browser, as well as connecting to user-owned storage accounts and syncing data across devices and applications.

Note

For brevity’s sake, we will also use the short name rs.js across these docs.
